articles.author: Jacek Krywko
articles.title: The largest marine reptile ever could match blue whales in size - Ars Technica
articles.description: Bones from the head of a reptile suggest a body that was well over 20 meters long.
articles.content:
10
Blue whales have been considered the largest creatures to ever live on Earth. With a maximum length of nearly 30 meters and weighing nearly 200 tons, they are the all-time undisputed heavyweight … [+4490 chars]
